channel.title: shell on 有翅膀的天狼

item.title: zsh与oh-my-zsh
item.description: zsh 介绍 http://foocoder.com/blog/wo-zai-yong-de-macruan-jian-2.html/ 安装 zsh 与 oh-my-zsh 1 2 brew install zsh curl -L https://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh/raw/master/tools/install.sh | sh 修改/etc/shells，添加/usr/local/bin/zsh 更改默认 shell 为 zsh 1 chsh -s /usr/local/bin/zsh 配置 iTerm2 的主题
